rukus.text: And (remember) when you left your family early in the morning to assign the positions of the believers for the war (battle of Ohod). God hears all and knows all
(Remember) when two groups among you intended to be cowardly while God was their protector (and supporter), and believers should put their trust in God
And God helped you at (war of) Badr while you were weak, so be cautious of God, that you may be thankful
(Remember) when you told the believers: is it not enough for you that your Master helps you with three thousands angels being sent down
Yes, if you persevere and control yourselves, and they suddenly come upon you (and attack you), your Master helps you with five thousands striking angels
And God only made it as good news for you and to reassure your hearts with it. And the help is only from the powerful and the wise God
In order to cut off (and wipe out) a part of those who disbelieved, or to subdue them so they turn back disappointed
Nothing is up to you, He either accepts their repentance or punishes them. They are indeed wrongdoers
Everything in the skies and on the earth belongs to God, He forgives whom He wants and punishes whom He wants. And God is forgiving and merciful
